User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ServAI customer service solution.

email.description: The email address of the user.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the user account was last updated.

Inquiry.title: Inquiry
Inquiry.description: Represents a single customer service inquiry or conversation.

userId.description: The ID of the user who initiated the inquiry.

customerName.description: The name of the customer for the inquiry.

status.description: The current status of the inquiry.

lastMessage.description: A snippet of the last message in the inquiry.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was last updated.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a customer service inquiry.

content.description: The text content of the message.

sentiment.description: The analyzed sentiment of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public-facing user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth user UID.

/inquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Top-level collection for all customer service inquiries.

/inquiries/{inquiryId}/messages/{message.description: Sub-collection storing all messages for a specific inquiry.
